about_the_game:
Jetpack George! is a fun and addictive endless runner where George the cat must try to eat all the cans of tuna after a long nap, he's starving. Invade the tuna factory equipped with your jetpack, and avoid missles, guns, homing lasers and platforms as you try to get as far as you can. If you succeed, you can upgrade your character, unlock new abilities such as the magnet, shield and double tuna which will help you get a top score.

Game features

-Unlockable costumes for the cat, George.
-Unlockable Magnet ability, which draws in tuna cans from afar.
-Unlockable shield upgrades, helping you to survive hits and obtain a further distance!
-Easy controlling, just click the mouse and have fun!

NEW!
Now supports Linux and Steam Deck!
detailed_description:
Just Updated

Jetpack George has now been updated to fully support game controllers! Yay!


About the Game

Jetpack George! is a fun and addictive endless runner where George the cat must try to eat all the cans of tuna after a long nap, he's starving. Invade the tuna factory equipped with your jetpack, and avoid missles, guns, homing lasers and platforms as you try to get as far as you can. If you succeed, you can upgrade your character, unlock new abilities such as the magnet, shield and double tuna which will help you get a top score.

Game features

-Unlockable costumes for the cat, George.
-Unlockable Magnet ability, which draws in tuna cans from afar.
-Unlockable shield upgrades, helping you to survive hits and obtain a further distance!
-Easy controlling, just click the mouse and have fun!

NEW!
Now supports Linux and Steam Deck!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS / Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD / NVIDIA GeForce / AMD Radeon
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: S / Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD / NVIDIA GeForce / AMD Radeon
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

name: Jetpack George!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD / NVIDIA GeForce / AMD Radeon
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Recommend a graphics card that supports Vulkan for best framerate.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD / NVIDIA GeForce / AMD Radeon
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Recommend a graphics card that supports Vulkan for best framerate.

short_description: Jetpack George! is a fun and addictive endless runner where George the cat must try to eat all the cans of tuna without getting wasted by rockets!
